Feel free to give us a call if you want more information about any of our services

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||5px|||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”60%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||36px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text module_class=”titleGreen” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_font_size=”50px” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”left” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”50px” custom_margin=”||28px|||” header_2_text_align_tablet=”center” header_2_text_align_phone=”” header_2_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”40px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Here are the main Snow Removal and Lawn Maintenance services we offer

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”0px||6%||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||10%||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Lawn Mowing / Lawn Care Services” image=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Minneapolis-Lawn-Mowing-and-Lawn-Care-Service.png” alt=”Minneapolis Lawn Mowing and Lawn Care Service” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”26px” header_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_css_blurb_image=”width:55px;” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”14px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_3_font=”|||on|||||” custom_margin=”||19px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Whether you want lawn mowing service done on a weekly or biweekly basis, we will make sure that our lawn care service keeps your yard in good shape and that it’s the look and length that you want.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjE3In19@” button_text=”Learn more” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#c2db0c” button_border_radius=”12px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” global_colors_info=”{}” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_bg_color__hover=”#068fd7″ button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||10%||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Walkway and Garden Edging” image=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Walkway-and-Garden-Edging-Service-Minneapolis.png” alt=”Walkway and Garden Edging Service Minneapolis” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”26px” header_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_css_blurb_image=”width:55px;” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”14px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_3_font=”|||on|||||” custom_margin=”||19px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

There’s nothing that makes your yard look better than the rest more than a perfectly straight edge along the sidewalks and walkways, so let us manicure your lawn and we’ll get it dressed to impress.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjE5In19@” button_text=”Learn more” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#c2db0c” button_border_radius=”12px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” global_colors_info=”{}” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_bg_color__hover=”#068fd7″ button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”0px||6%||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||10%||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Snow Removal” image=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Minneapolis-Snow-Service-Removal.png” alt=”Minneapolis Snow Service Removal” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”26px” header_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_css_blurb_image=”width:55px;” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”14px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_3_font=”|||on|||||” custom_margin=”||19px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We’ll make sure your home or commercial property’s walkways, driveways, and sidewalks are cleared of snow for safety and convenience. Whether it’s snow plowing or snow blowing, we’ll get it done quickly and efficiently on a snow removal service that’s right for you.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjM1In19@” button_text=”Learn more” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#c2db0c” button_border_radius=”12px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” global_colors_info=”{}” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_bg_color__hover=”#068fd7″ button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||10%||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Spring and Fall Cleanup” image=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Minneapolis-Spring-and-Fall-Cleanup.png” alt=”Minneapolis Spring and Fall Cleanup” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”26px” header_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_css_blurb_image=”width:55px;” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”14px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_3_font=”|||on|||||” custom_margin=”||19px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

These can be pretty time consuming jobs, and who likes raking for hours? That’s why we recommend letting us take the hassle away, and make sure that your yard is ready to grow in the Spring, and sleep in the Fall.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjI1In19@” button_text=”Learn more” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#c2db0c” button_border_radius=”12px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” global_colors_info=”{}” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_bg_color__hover=”#068fd7″ button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”0px||6%||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||10%||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Dethatching” image=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Dethatching-Minneapolis.png” alt=”Dethatching Minneapolis” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”26px” header_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_css_blurb_image=”width:55px;” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”14px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_3_font=”|||on|||||” custom_margin=”||19px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dethatching is vital for the health of your lawn. Our lawn care experts will make sure your lawn’s roots are protected the right way so you can have a greener and more luscious lawn this season.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjI2In19@” button_text=”Learn more” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#c2db0c” button_border_radius=”12px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” global_colors_info=”{}” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_bg_color__hover=”#068fd7″ button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||10%||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Garden Maintenance / Planting” image=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Garden-Maintenance-and-Planting-Service-Minneapolis.png” alt=”Garden Maintenance and Planting Service Minneapolis” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”26px” header_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_css_blurb_image=”width:55px;” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”14px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_3_font=”|||on|||||” custom_margin=”||19px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We don’t just take care of lawns and landscaping. We can also help you prepare your garden space, plant vegetables and flowers, and maintain your garden.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjMyIn19@” button_text=”Learn more” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#c2db0c” button_border_radius=”12px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” global_colors_info=”{}” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_bg_color__hover=”#068fd7″ button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”0px||6%||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||10%||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Hedge Trimming” image=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Hedge-Trimming-Minneapolis.png” alt=”Hedge Trimming Minneapolis” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”26px” header_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_css_blurb_image=”width:55px;” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”14px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_3_font=”|||on|||||” custom_margin=”||19px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

If keeping your hedges trimmed and healthy feels like too much work for your precious weekend hours, let us keep your hedges at a good length and shape all summer long.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjMxIn19@” button_text=”Learn more” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#c2db0c” button_border_radius=”12px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” global_colors_info=”{}” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_bg_color__hover=”#068fd7″ button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||10%||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Yard Trimming and Blowing” image=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Minneapolis-Yard-Trimming-and-Blowing-Service.png” alt=”Minneapolis Yard Trimming and Blowing Service” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”26px” header_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_css_blurb_image=”width:55px;” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”14px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_3_font=”|||on|||||” custom_margin=”||19px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

These services will ensure that the parts of your lawn which the mower can’t reach are taken care of (like under bushes and lawn ornaments), and that no grass clippings will be left on your walkways.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIxIn19@” button_text=”Learn more” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#c2db0c” button_border_radius=”12px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” global_colors_info=”{}” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_bg_color__hover=”#068fd7″ button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”0px||6%||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||10%||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Mulching” image=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Mulching-Service-Minneapolis.png” alt=”Mulching Service Minneapolis” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”26px” header_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_css_blurb_image=”width:55px;” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”14px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_3_font=”|||on|||||” custom_margin=”||19px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

In landscaping and garden areas, mulching is important for both the plants and the overall appearance, so let us know where you want us to mulch and we’ll make sure it gets done for you.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjMyIn19@” button_text=”Learn more” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#c2db0c” button_border_radius=”12px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” global_colors_info=”{}” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_bg_color__hover=”#068fd7″ button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||10%||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Lawn Aeration” image=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Lawn-Aeration-Service-Minneapolis.png” alt=”Lawn Aeration Service Minneapolis” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”26px” header_line_height=”2.2em” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_css_blurb_image=”width:55px;” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”14px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_3_font=”|||on|||||” custom_margin=”||19px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Yard aeration (aka core aeration) is an often- overlooked service that is extremely important for your lawn’s health, so make sure that you give us a call to aerate your lawn and make sure it’s getting the oxygen and nutrients it needs.

excerpt.rendered: Feel free to give us a call if you want more information about any of our servicesHere are the main Snow Removal and Lawn Maintenance services we offerWhether you want lawn mowing service done on a weekly or biweekly basis, we will make sure that our lawn care service keeps your yard in good shape and […]
